tn.ref: The second casting of lots fell to Simeon
tn.text: "The second time Joshua cast lots, the lot indicated the tribe of Simeon"
number two in a list (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])

tn.ref: it was assigned to each of their clans
tn.text: This can be stated in active form. AT: "Joshua assigned the land to each of their clans" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])

tn.ref: Their inheritance was in the middle of the inheritance that belonged to the tribe of Judah
tn.text: The land is spoken of as if it were an inheritance that the tribes received as a permanent possession. AT: "The land that they received as an inheritance was in the middle of the land that the tribe of Judah received as an inheritance" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
The writer lists cities that were in the land that the tribe of Simeon received as an inheritance. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

The land and cities that the tribe of Simeon received are spoken of as if they were an inheritance that they received as a permanent possession. AT: "They had the following cities for their inheritance" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
The writer continues to list the cities that were in the land that the tribe of Simeon received as an inheritance. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
Translate this the same as in [[:en:bible:notes:jos:15:29|15:31]].

tn.ref: This was the inheritance of the tribe of Simeon
tn.text: The land and cities that the tribe of Simeon received are spoken of as if they were an inheritance that they received as a permanent possession. AT: "This was the land and the cities that the tribe of Simeon received as an inheritance" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
This can be stated in active form. AT: "which Joshua gave to their clans" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])

tn.ref: the portion of land assigned to the tribe of Judah
tn.text: This can be stated in active form. AT: "the portion of land which Joshua assigned to the tribe of Judah" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
"the middle of Judah's portion of land"
Translate this phrase in the same way you did in [[:en:bible:notes:jos:19:01|19:1]].
number three in a list (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
These are the names of places. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
"across from Jokneam"

tn.ref: Sarid ... Kisloth Tabor ... Daberath ... Japhia ... Gath Hepher ... Ethkazin ... Rimmon ... Neah
tn.text: These are the names of cities. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: Hannathon ... Iphtah El ... Kattath ... Nahalal ... Shimron ... Idalah ... Bethlehem
tn.text: These are names of places. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
This is not the same "Bethlehem" that is south of Jerusalem in Judah. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: This was the inheritance of the tribe of Zebulun
tn.text: The land and cities that the tribe of Zebulun received are spoken of as if they were an inheritance that they received as a permanent possession. AT: "This was the land and the cities that the tribe of Zebulun received as an inheritance" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])

tn.ref: that was given to their clans
tn.text: This can be stated in active form. AT: "that Joshua gave to their clans" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
Translate this phrase in the same way you did in in [[:en:bible:notes:jos:19:01|19:1]].
number four in a list (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
These are names of cities. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: Rabbith ... Kishion ... Ebez ... Remeth ... Engannim ... Enhaddah ... Bethpazzez ... Shahazumah
tn.text: These are names of cities. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
This is the name of a mountain. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: This was the inheritance of the tribe of Issachar
tn.text: The land and cities that the tribe of Issachar received are spoken of as if they were an inheritance that they received as a permanent possession. AT: "This was the land and the cities that the tribe of Issachar received as an inheritance" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])

tn.ref: it was given to their clans
tn.text: This can be stated in active form. AT: "Joshua gave it to their clans" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
Translate this phrase in the same way you did in [[:en:bible:notes:jos:19:01|19:1]].
number five in a list (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])

tn.ref: it was given to their clans
tn.text: This can be stated in active form. AT: "Joshua gave it to their clans" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])

tn.ref: Helkath, Hali, Beten, Achshaph, Allammelech, Amad, and Mishall ... Shihor Libnath
tn.text: These are the names of cities. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: Beth Dagon ... Valley of Iphtahel ... Bethemek ... Neiel ... Cabul ... Ebron ... Rehob ... Hammon ... Kanah
tn.text: These are the names of places. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
These are the names of places. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: This was the inheritance of the tribe of Asher
tn.text: The land and cities that the tribe of Asher received are spoken of as if they were an inheritance that they received as a permanent possession. AT: "This was the land and the cities that the tribe of Asher received as an inheritance" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])

tn.ref: it was given to their clans
tn.text: This can be stated in active form. AT: "Joshua gave it to their clans" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
Translate this phrase in the same way you did in [[:en:bible:notes:jos:19:01|19:1]].
number six in a list (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])

tn.ref: it was given to their clans
tn.text: This can be stated in active form. AT: "Joshua gave it to their clans" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])

tn.ref: Heleph ... Zaanannim ... Adaminekeb ... Jabneel ... Lakkum ... Aznoth Tabor ... Hukkok
tn.text: These are the names of cities. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: Ziddim ... Zer ... Hammath ... Rakkath ... Chinnereth ... Adamah ... Ramah ... Hazor ... Edrei ... En Hazor
tn.text: These are the names of cities. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
This is not the same location as "Hamath," but is located on the west shore of the Sea of Galilee.
These are names of cities. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: This was the inheritance of the tribe of Naphtali
tn.text: The land and cities that the tribe of Naphtali received are spoken of as if they were an inheritance that they received as a permanent possession. AT: "This was the land and the cities that the tribe of Naphtali received as an inheritance" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])

tn.ref: it was given to their clans
tn.text: This can be stated in active form. AT: "Joshua gave it to their clans" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
Translate this phrase in the same way you did in [[:en:bible:notes:jos:19:01|19:1]].
number seven in a list (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])

The land that the tribe of Dan received is spoken of as if it was an inheritance that they received as a permanent possession. AT: "The territory of land that the tribe of Dan received as an inheritance" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])

tn.ref: Zorah, Eshtaol, Ir Shemesh, Shaalabbin, Aijalon, and Ithlah
tn.text: These are the names of places. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: Elon, Timnah, Ekron, Eltekeh, Gibbethon, Baalath, Jehud, Bene Berak, Gath Rimmon, Me Jarkon, and Rakkon
tn.text: These are the names of cities. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
"opposite Joppa" or "beside Joppa"
This is the name of a city. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: This was the inheritance of the tribe of Dan
tn.text: The land and cities that the tribe of Dan received are spoken of as if they were an inheritance that they received as a permanent possession. AT: "This was the land and the cities that the tribe of Dan received as an inheritance" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])

tn.ref: it was given to their clans
tn.text: This can be stated in active form. AT: "Joshua gave it to their clans" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])

tn.ref: gave an inheritance among themselves to Joshua son of Nun
tn.text: The city that Joshua received is spoken of as if it were an inheritance that he received as a permanent possession. AT: "gave a city within their own land as an inheritance to Joshua son of Nun" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
This is the name of a city. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

The land and cities that the various tribes received are spoken of as if they were an inheritance that they received as a permanent possession. AT: "These are the portions of land and the cities ... assigned as inheritances" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
